Privacy Policy

Your privacy and trust are extremely important to us. Please read this policy carefully.

1. Introduction

Psychology Zone is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

2. Information We Collect

We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the site includes:

  • Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, city, and date of birth
  • Session Information: Details about your therapy sessions and therapeutic progress
  • Payment Information: Transaction details (processed securely through third-party payment providers)
  • Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our website

3. Use of Your Information

Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the site to:

  • Create and manage your account
  • Schedule and conduct therapy sessions
  • Send you promotional communications (with your consent)
  • Process payments securely
  • Improve our website and services
  • Respond to your inquiries and customer service requests

4. Confidentiality of Therapeutic Information

All information shared during therapy sessions is strictly confidential. We maintain professional boundaries and ethical standards consistent with Indian psychological and counseling practices. Your therapeutic information will not be disclosed to any third party without your explicit consent, except where required by law.

5. Security of Your Information

We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

6. Disclosure of Your Information

We will not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to others. We may disclose your information only when:

  • Required by law or legal processes
  • Necessary to protect the safety, property, and rights of others
  • You have given us explicit permission
  • To comply with court orders or government requests

7. Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of third-party websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policy of any website before providing personal information.

8. Retention of Data

We retain your personal and therapeutic information for as long as necessary to provide you with our services and comply with legal obligations. You may request deletion of your information at any time, subject to legal and professional requirements.

9. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal information
  • Correct inaccurate information
  • Request deletion of your information (with legal limitations)
  • Opt-out of marketing communications
  • Withdraw consent at any time

10. Cookies and Tracking

We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

11. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: info@psychologyzone.in

Phone: +91 89689 00002

Address: Arjun Singh Bajwa 20, Sector 8A, Chandigarh, India

12. Changes to This Policy

Psychology Zone may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by updating the "Last Modified" date of this Privacy Policy. Your continued use of our services constitutes your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

Last Modified: December 2024
